bio: Fresh out of the coding cave and fueled by caffeine, I’m a full-stack web dev who speaks fluent JavaScript and dreams in pixels. I turn coffee into code, and bugs into ‘features’.
about: I’m a full-stack web dev who loves building sleek, functional web experiences. Always up on the latest tech and ready to turn creative ideas into clean, working code. Let’s make something awesome!

projects.title: AI Blog Writer
projects.description: Created an AI-powered web app that automatically generates engaging blog posts using Hugging Face APIs. It features a text generation algorithm and a text-to-image tool to enhance content and user engagement.

projects.title: Conet
projects.description: Led the requirement gathering and worked with designers to create a college project social networking app. Integrated features for students to showcase their skills and projects, allowing them to highlight accomplishments and connect with peers.

projects.title: Newsify
projects.description: Developed a MERN-based news aggregator that provides fresh news based on users' locations. Assisted with API integration and data manipulation to create a dynamic experience, and implemented a third-party API to fetch news tailored to users' preferences and locations.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained Bitcoin protocol-related software
Implemented cryptographic solutions for secure transactions
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate Bitcoin functionality
Optimized performance of Bitcoin-based financial applications
